channel.title: Compressing my client for DL
channel.description:
So i am trying to ready my client for download. However, I am not okay with how the files are out in the open for users to potentially change settings etc. Here is what I mean:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/10r90d1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/a2olx.png[/img]
The goal is so that all the users have to do is open the download and the "high detail" and "low detail" will be available up front.

item.title: Compressing my client for DL
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

You could start by deleting your source files (del *.java), Jarring your client (JarMaker) and obfuscating your program (ProGuard).

Read full topic
